EDAM_topic: Microbial ecology, Machine learning, Pathology, Public health and epidemiology, Allergy, clinical immunology and immunotherapeutics
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Microbial ecology, Machine learning, Pathology, Public health and epidemiology, Allergy, clinical immunology and immunotherapeutics
bio.tool_description: Deep representation learning for disease prediction based on microbiome data.DeepMicro is a deep representation learning framework exploiting various autoencoders to learn robust low-dimensional representations from high-dimensional data and training classification models based on the learned representation.
